title: My Neighborhood
description: In My Neighborhood, students take a tour of a boy's neighborhood and learn about common places located there. Concept of a map is also introduced to students. Patterned text, high-frequency words, and supportive pictures make this book perfect for emerging readers.
reviewWords: bakery, fire station, grocery store, library, neighborhood, streets
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial Blends                : Discriminate initial consonant blend /st/
phonics: Consonant Blends : Identify initial consonant blend st
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word my
